content:
Send Voice Messages in Messaging Sessions

If a customer is more comfortable with spoken instruction, honor their preference. Record and send voice messages up to 1 minute long in enhanced Messaging channels.

Available in: Lightning Experience.
This article applies to: Enhanced WhatsApp, Facebook Messenger, SMS, and Apple Messages for Business channels.

To send a voice message:

In an active messaging session, click the microphone icon.
Give your web browser access to your microphone if prompted.
Speak your message for up to 1 minute.
Click the stop icon when you're done.
Optionally, play back or delete your message.
Send it to the customer when ready.

After sending a voice message, the customer can access it for 30 days. Voice messages are included in the conversation transcript like any other message.

In standard Messaging channels, agents can't record and send voice messages or send audio file attachments.
title: Sending Voice Messages with Salesforce Service Cloud
